name: Classic White Tee
description: A timeless classic white t-shirt made from 100% cotton. Perfect for everyday wear with a comfortable fit and breathable fabric. Essential wardrobe staple that pairs well with any outfit.

name: Denim Jeans
description: Premium quality denim jeans with a modern slim fit. Features reinforced stitching, classic five-pocket design, and comfortable stretch fabric for all-day wear.

name: Leather Jacket
description: Genuine leather jacket with a sleek design and premium finish. Features multiple pockets, full zip closure, and soft inner lining for comfort and style.

name: Summer Dress
description: Lightweight and breezy summer dress perfect for warm weather. Features floral print, adjustable straps, and flowing silhouette for comfort and elegance.

name: Running Shoes
description: High-performance running shoes with advanced cushioning technology. Features breathable mesh upper, responsive midsole, and durable rubber outsole for optimal comfort.

name: Cozy Sweater
description: Ultra-soft knit sweater perfect for cooler weather. Made from premium wool blend with ribbed cuffs and hem for a comfortable, relaxed fit.
